description: A pleasant hike to a beautiful view of the Waimea Canyon, which continues to a small pool with a waterfall.  Hike is a bit steep in places, and could be very slippery if wet.
directions: Drive on Hwy 550 just past mile marker 14.  Dirt road is on the east side of the road, and is marked with a small sign.  Parking is on the west side of the road.
title: Canyon Rim Trail
